SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: This is an example checklist with 2 item types. It is set as the CRICOS checklist so was retrieved using isCRICOS=1. In this example, this same response would be returned if using portfolioChecklistID=37

PARAMETERS.NAME: portfolioChecklistID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ID of the Contact Portfolio Checklist to read. One of this or isCRICOS is required

PARAMETERS.NAME: isCRICOS
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: If passed, will return the defined CRICOS checklist. This feature must be enabled and the checklist must defined in the client's System Settings or an error will be thrown.

DESCRIPTION: Returns a single Contact Portfolio Checklist, along with the array of Portfolio document types that make up the checklist. These checklists can be used when searching for a contact's documents using GET /api/contact/portfolio.
